event.title: FSFE local group Berlin meeting, Germany

body.p: The FSFE local group Berlin is having its regular monthly meeting on the second Thursday of February. Anyone interested in software freedom is welcome at the E-LOK in Laskerstra√üe 4-6 not far from Ostkreuz station. The meeting is starting at 19h and mostly in German but English can be spoken as well. Entrance to the E-LOK is over the yard and is barrier free. Bring good vibes with you.
